quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Academy Awards and Film
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, country, __________________. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Any country that obeys seat belt laws is an object of my _____________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: fasten nation

questions.question: Its raining cats and dogs. Well, as long as it doesnt __________________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: reindeer

questions.question: During this Academy Award ceremony no movie won more than one Oscar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2nd

questions.question: At the 1st Academy Awards ceremony this film was nominated for the most Academy Awards (5) and won only three.

options.text: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seventh Heaven

questions.question: When the Pirates of the Caribbean ordered my death, my mind went _________. I knew I was in _____  ______.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: plank - Depp ship

questions.question: Its not that the man did not know how to juggle, he just didnt have ______________.

options.text: the courage to face an audience

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the balls to do it

questions.question: What is NOT true about the 2nd Academy Awards?

options.text: The number of categories was reduced from twelve to seven.
It was the only occasion where there were no official nominees.
Elliot Clawson was nominated for Best Writing of 3 pictures – The Cop,The Leatherneck, Sal of Singapore.
It was the first ceremony for which the winners were not announced in advance.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elliot Clawson was nominated for Best Writing of 3 pictures – The Cop,The Leatherneck, Sal of Singapore.

questions.question: She wanted the large estate quite badly but, she dared not ___________________.

options.text: mansion it to her frugal husband
mention it to her frugal husband

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: mansion it to her frugal husband

questions.question: What is the first film to win the Best Director Oscar without being nominated for Best Picture?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Divine Lady

questions.question: During the first Academy Awards, Warner Brothers got an Honorary Award for The Jazz Singer. What individual got an Honorary Award as well?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlie Chaplin

questions.question: Since I went to work in the plumbing department of the home center, I have developed a _______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: multi-fauceted personality disorder

questions.question: This category was introduced during the 3rd Academy Awards and was the first new one since the awards began.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best Sound Recording

questions.question: This picture was the first western to win the Academy Award for Best Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cimarron

questions.question: Who was the first child star to receive a Best Actor/Actress nomination?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jackie Cooper

questions.question: The painter was hospitalized due to ______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: too many strokes

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Film
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, trintignant, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who performed the song Skyfall which won the Academy Award for Best Original Song at the 85th Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adele

questions.question: Which of these Acacemy Award-winning movies is NOT correctly matched with its director?

options.text: Silver Linings Playbook - David O. Russell

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Django Unchained - Joe Wright

questions.question: The 5th Academy Awards saw the introduction of 3 new categories. What was NOT one of them?

options.text: Best Live Action Short Film, Color
Best Live Action Short Film, Novelty
Best Live Action Short Film, Comedy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best Live Action Short Film, Color

questions.question: What is the first film to be nominated only for the Best Picture Oscar, which it won?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grand Hotel

questions.question: In what country is the computer-animated fantasy film Brave set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scotland

questions.question: What does the word Argo refer to in Ben Afflecks dramatic thriller Argo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a fake movie production

questions.question: This drama film, starring Jean-Louis Trintignant, Emmanuelle Riva and Isabelle Huppert, won the Best Foreign Language Oscar at the 85th Academy Awards.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amour

questions.question: In the Oscar-winning movie Life of Pi, Pi was named by his father after which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a swimming pool in France

questions.question: Jennifer Lawrence, who won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in Silver Linings Playbook, achieved international recognition as the heroine Katniss Everdeen in this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hunger Games

questions.question: On what period of Abraham Lincolns life does Steven Spielbergs 2012 movie Lincoln focus?

options.text: the final four months of his life
the first years of his presidency

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the final four months of his life

questions.question: Which movie title was translated as Held by Wind in Montana in Japan?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Horse Whisperer

questions.question: What actress portrays Anna Karenina in the self-titled 2012 romantic drama film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Keira Knightley

questions.question: These were the first two movies to receive both Best Actor Oscar and Best Actress Oscar nominations.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cimarron; A Free Soul

questions.question: What movie title was translated in Japan as I Love My Dad The Best In The World?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jersey Girl

questions.question: The 2012 Academy Award-winning musical drama Les Misérables was based on a novel by this French author.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Victor Hugo

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Title and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, punches, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: There are pigs that sound like horses, in _______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: my neigh-boar hood

questions.question: What movie title was translated as Rain of Falafel in Israel?

options.text: He Died with a Felafel in His Hand
Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

questions.question: The Sunny Classroom is the Japanese title of this American movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Holland’s Opus

questions.question: What movie title was translated as The Spy Who Behaved Very Nicely Around Me in Malaysia?

options.text: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me

questions.question: The title of what movie was translated as Love in the Skies in Israel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Top Gun

questions.question: Some mathematicians are reluctant to _________________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cosine a loan

questions.question: What movie title was translated as Super Horny in Israel and Superguys Who Play Hooky in Portugal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Superbad

questions.question: Hum Tum is the Bollywood version of this Hollywood film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When Harry Met Sally...

questions.question: Every calendars days are ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: numbered

questions.question: I’m Drunk and You’re a Prostitute is the Japanese title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leaving Las Vegas

questions.question: I got a small ticket for speeding.  __________________.

options.text: I put up a big fuss.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Its fine with me.

questions.question: A cartoonist was found dead in his home. (Next sentence please)

options.text: A crayon was the weapon of choice.
The police want to know what happens at the end of the current cartoon.
He should have been working in an office.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Details are sketchy.

questions.question: I fed some lemon to my cat and now I have a __________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: sour puss

questions.question: What film was called Super Speeding Cleaning Evil Accounts in Thailand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drive Angry

questions.question: In the Philippines, they pull no punches with the title Because She’s Ugly. What is the original title of the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Never Been Kissed

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Stupidity and People
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, people, regrets. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: “If you simplify your English, you are freed from the worst follies of orthodoxy. You cannot speak any of the necessary dialects, and when you make a stupid remark its stupidity will be obvious, even to yourself.” Which novelist said this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Orwell

questions.question: Which comedian do you think came up with these remarks: “Just think of how stupid the average person is, and then realize half of them are even stupider!” and “Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that.”.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Carlin

questions.question: “Conservatives are not necessarily stupid, but most stupid people are conservatives.” What political economist made this unflattering comment?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Stuart Mill

questions.question: This famous actress uttered the words: “If I play a stupid girl, and ask a stupid question, Ive got to follow it through. What am I supposed to do, look intelligent?”
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marilyn Monroe

questions.question: Which bozo made both of these quotes: “If youre going to get mad at me everytime I do something stupid then I guess Ill have to stop doing stupid things!” and Stupid, eh? Yeah, Im stupid. Stupid like a fox!”.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Homer Simpson from The Simpsons

questions.question: Who said, “Some people think having large breasts makes a woman stupid. Actually, its quite the opposite: A woman having large breasts makes men stupid.”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rita Rudner

questions.question: What’s a real estate lawyer’s least favourite song?

options.text: Will Your Lawyer Talk to God For You?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lien On Me

questions.question: What philosopher said “Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education.”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bertrand Russell

questions.question: “I refuse to slap some stupid words on the stupid paper just so we have a stupid song finished.” Which singer/songwriter came up with the triple stupid?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Suzanne Vega

questions.question: “If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?” Which comic book creator created this witty remark?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scott Adams

questions.question: Santas helpers are ________________.

options.text: useless after a New Years Eve party

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: subordinate clauses

questions.question: “Beware your inner idiot. Success and stupidity dont mix. Your bosss stupidity is only half the problem. Your own stupidity can easily complete the disaster.” Which government official said this?

options.text: J. Edgar Hoover (Director of the FBI)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. Edgar Hoover (Director of the FBI)

questions.question: “Creating a cultural icon out of someone who goes, Im stupid, isnt it cute? makes me want to throw daggers. I want to say to them, My grandma did not fight for what she fought for just so you can start telling women its fun to be stupid. Saying that to young women, little girls, my daughter? Its not OK.” Which actress owns this one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reese Witherspoon

questions.question: Did you see the movie about the hot dog?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was an Oscar Wiener.

questions.question: “I have many regrets, and Im sure everyone does. The stupid things you do, you regret… if you have any sense, and if you dont regret them, maybe youre stupid.” is a quote from this famous actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katharine Hepburn

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Movie and Title
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, hard, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Germany this movie is titled Cuckoo while in Japan it is called 17-Year Old Girl’s Medical Chart.

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Battle Nations and Game
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, cost. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of Natalie Portmans Black Swan co-star whom she married in August 2012?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Benjamin Millepied

questions.question: In December 2012, this Oscar-winning actress secretly married her boyfriend of about one year, Ned Rocknroll.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kate Winslet

questions.question: Which building trains Allied Raider Mammoths in the strategy game Battle Nations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prestigious Academy

questions.question: In the strategy game Battle Nations, the Wimp has the highest possible attack off any unit.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which Silver Wolf unit is not trainable in the game Battle Nations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Garbage Truck

questions.question: After four years together, this couple announced their split in March 2011. However, by fall 2011 they reunited and married in October 2012 at the Borgo Egnazia resort in Fasano, Italy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jessica Biel and Justin Timberlake

questions.question: What actress wore a Valentino wedding dress when she married actor and jewelry designer Adam Shulman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anne Hathaway

questions.question: In 2012, this actor married Hilaria Thomas, an instructor with Yoga Vida in Manhattan, who is 26 years his junior.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alec Baldwin

questions.question: How much nanopods does the Meerkat cost in the video game Battle Nations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 45

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cryo Trooper and Frostbite

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lightning Trooper

questions.question: In May 2012, this celebrity married Priscilla Chan, in a ceremony at his home in Palo Alto, California.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mark Zuckerberg

questions.question: Which Battle Nations unit has the highest dodge capabilities?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scout Bike

questions.question: How many tiers of The Infected are there in the game Battle Nations?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scarlett Johansson
